description.flashcards: Do you remember all the words
description.spelling_check: Write the correct translation of the word
description.add_or_edit_word: The word can have a maximum of 25 letters and be without special characters. Description can have a maximum of 100 letters.
description.add_or_edit_note: The title can have a maximum of 25 letters and content can have a maximum of 300 letters.
description.edit_profile: Edit what you want to change. First and last name can have a maximum of 25 letters. Password must be at least 8 characters.
description.upload_avatar: To upload avatar, please choose file from your computer. Image must have maximum 0,5 MB and 100x100 px. You can use .jpg, .png and .jpeg files.

info.min_three_words: You must add at least 3 words!
info.no_words: You don't have any words yet! Add new one!
info.no_notes: You don't have any notes yet! Add new one!

about_section.header: Do you have problems with hard words in the article or your English career? Do you want to master it? Try Fiszki App!
about_section.description: Application help people learn words, which one they have a problem. It's like flashcards but with bonuses.  You have a lot of options to learn.
about_section.flashcards: Flashcards: It's like flashcards. If you know this word, you get 1 point.
about_section.spelling_check: Spelling check: Check your spelling skill.
about_section.quiz: Quiz: You have only one correct answer. You get 1 point when you pick a good answer.
about_section.database: Words list and notes: Your database of words and notes.
about_section.footer: In My Account section, you have all statistics and information about your account.
about_section.send_email: Do you see bugs or have some ideas to improve the application? Send me a message and I try my best:

validation.password_minimum: Too short. Password must be at least 8 characters.
validation.password_confirm: You need to confirm your password.
